title: Volume cross-section square:  linear and rational

content.question: The region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is a square. Find the volume of this solid.

frqParts.text: The region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is a square. Find the volume of this solid.

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
